tool.name: getChloro

param.name: working_folder
param.displayname: Input: Folder Location of Dark Targets GDBs
param.dialogReference: This parameter points to the folder containing all the yearly GDBs that have been previously created with the "1_Condition Yearly Dark Targets Data" script tool. This folder should normally be named "Products" and contains the yearly GDBs (named "2010.gdb", "2011.gdb", etc.)

param.name: ftp_dir
param.dialogReference:
This parameter contains the ftp address where the chlorophyll_a data is available for download from the Physical Oceanography Distributed Archive Center from NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory.

("podaac-ftp.jpl.nasa.gov/allData/modis/L3/aqua/chlA/v2014.0/4km/daily/")

param.name: Day Range
param.dialogReference: This parameter the number of days +/- for the corresponding day that chlorophyll data will be downloaded to analyse a chlorophyll window. '0' will download chlorophyll_a only for the day of acquisition.

tool.summary:
This script checks the acquisition dates for every feature class in the yearly GDBs and downloads theMODIS chlorophyll_a concentration data for the corresponding day.

The chlorophyll_a data is downloaded to the "Auxiliary" folder directory and organized by year within the "Chlorophyll" folder.

If the chlorophyll_a data has already been downloaded for the required acquisition day, the script will not download again and skips to the next acquisition day.

The chlorophyll_a data is downloaded to the "Auxiliary" folder directory and organized by year within the "Chlorophyll" folder.

If the chlorophyll_a data has already been downloaded for the required acquisition day, the script will not download again and skips to the next acquisition day.
